thread.title: Another Inwood Gem.
thread.title_full: Another Inwood Gem. - Review of Hotel le Tourville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: rigel1056
title: Another Inwood Gem.
text:
Hotel le Tourville is in the 7e of Paris, a wonderful location to stay for business or pleasure. Invalides, Tour Eiffel, museums and restaurants abound. The hotel staff were friendly, knowledgeable and assisted me with all of my requests. The hotel amenities and conveniences provided are exceptional. Beverages, phone service, breakfast service, all were pleasant surprises and upscale. Le Tourville is another hotel gem from Inwood. I will definitely return.
Room Tip: All rooms in which my colleagues stayed seemed nice throughout the hotel. See more room tips
